moduleMetadataJson.name: Password Cracker: Databases
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module uses John the Ripper or Hashcat to identify weak passwords that have been
        acquired from the mssql_hashdump, mysql_hashdump, postgres_hashdump, or oracle_hashdump modules.
        Passwords that have been successfully cracked are then saved as proper credentials.
        Due to the complexity of some of the hash types, they can be very slow.  Setting the
        ITERATION_TIMEOUT is highly recommended.
author: theLightCosine <theLightCosine@metasploit.com>
hdm <x@hdm.io>
h00die

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: VERBOSE
options.description: Enable detailed status messages

options.name: CONFIG
options.description: The path to a John config file to use instead of the default

options.name: CUSTOM_WORDLIST
options.description: The path to an optional custom wordlist

options.name: ITERATION_TIMEOUT
options.description: The max-run-time for each iteration of cracking

options.name: CRACKER_PATH
options.description: The absolute path to the cracker executable

options.name: FORK
options.description: Forks for John the Ripper to use

options.name: KORELOGIC
options.description: Apply the KoreLogic rules to John the Ripper Wordlist Mode(slower)

options.name: MUTATE
options.description: Apply common mutations to the Wordlist (SLOW)

options.name: POT
options.description: The path to a John POT file to use instead of the default

options.name: USE_CREDS
options.description: Use existing credential data saved in the database

options.name: USE_DB_INFO
options.description: Use looted database schema info to seed the wordlist

options.name: USE_DEFAULT_WORDLIST
options.description: Use the default metasploit wordlist

options.name: USE_HOSTNAMES
options.description: Seed the wordlist with hostnames from the workspace

options.name: USE_ROOT_WORDS
options.description: Use the Common Root Words Wordlist

options.name: DeleteTempFiles
options.description: Delete temporary wordlist and hash files

options.name: OptimizeKernel
options.description: Utilize Optimized Kernels in Hashcat

options.name: ShowCommand
options.description: Print the cracker command being used

options.name: MSSQL
options.description: Include MSSQL hashes

options.name: MYSQL
options.description: Include MySQL hashes

options.name: ORACLE
options.description: Include Oracle hashes

options.name: POSTGRES
options.description: Include Postgres hashes

options.name: INCREMENTAL
options.description: Run in incremental mode

options.name: WORDLIST
options.description: Run in wordlist mode
